txt.en:
'Every summer, swarms of sickle-flies plague the coast of the Lagorduin south-west of here. They're awful pests.'

He bares his arm, which sports a row of awful raised welts.

'Their bites and stings are so itchy! This is torture. I would appreciate if you culled some of them.'
Branach has asked you to defeat sickle flies.\n\nThe sickle-flies in question can be found to the south-west of Branach's farm, Cornworth.
'Thank you for squashing those disgusting pests!'
Branach has asked you to exterminate an overgrowth of sickle-flies.
You have done as Branach asked. Return to him.\n\nBranach can be found at his farm, Cornworth, north-west of Gnatstead.
